name: Robobox - Team Iconic
description:
You're a little robot that needs to sort boxes in a big warehouse. Go through the post-canada strike line to start your day. Each box has a color and needs to be sorted in the proper drop zone. Use the scanner room to reveil the color of the boxes. Each successful drop gives you points, but watch out not to drop a box in the wrong drop zone or you will lose points. You can discard boxes in the garbage zone. Enjoy!

HTML version of the game : https://frankgalax.itch.io/roboboxhtml

Controls : Left stick or WASD or Arrows

Janick Fortin - Programming

Francis Richard-Emond - Programming

Nicolas Gauthier-Régis - Art

Carl Perreault - Art

Spécial Thanks to Jessyca Lemire-Bertrand and Thomas Tu
